PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ActuatorTypeLinearActuation
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Characteristics of linear actuation of an actuator History: Replaces Pset_LinearActuator

PropertyDef.Name: Force
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the maximum close-off force for the actuator.

PropertyDef.Name: Stroke
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the maximum distance the actuator must traverse.
